# evaluation(on:)

**Instance Method**

Generates metrics that describe the hand pose classifier’s performance with a dataset of labeled images.

## Declaration

```swift
func evaluation(on annotatedImages: MLHandPoseClassifier.DataSource) throws -> MLClassifierMetrics
```

## Evaluating a hand pose classifier

- **trainingMetrics**: Measurements of the hand pose classifier’s performance on the training dataset.
- **validationMetrics**: Measurements of the hand pose classifier’s performance on the validation dataset.
